urls.title: Need Help Recovering Your Baggage? | Malaysia Airlines
urls.description: Learn more about how to file a report and track mishandled baggage through the Self-Service Baggage Reporting portal.

data.text:
@archashjosh << If you have not reported the incident at the airport, you may create a report via this link: https://t.co/WMiVC5vdAs. 

Furthermore, you may trace your baggage via this link: https://t.co/gXTzRuo9sL. 

Regards,
AR

urls.title: My name is incorrect on my booking. Do I need to pay to change it?
urls.description: My name is incorrect on my booking. Do I need to pay to change it? Name correction is only allowed on a conditional basis where it needs editing of names and adding the correct spelling as it appears in the travel document of passengers. Name correction for above 3 characters or other than 1+2 characters as per item (2) Allowed before ticket issuance at no charge Allowed after ticket issuance with a name correction fee of MYR150 or equivalent amount in other local currencies and applicable Service Tax

data.text:
@varundaaa Hello, @varundaaa. Please be informed that due to the high volume of refund requests received since the COVID-19 outbreak, the respective team will be processing the refund substantially longer than usual. 

>>

@varundaaa We apologise for the inconvenience, @varundaaa. Due to limited access here on Social Media, we are unable to provide call-back service. Hence, we would recommend that you get in touch with our Global Contact Centre team for further assistance. -KS
